Incident Reduction through Predictive Analytics for a Multinational Manufacturer of Household Cleaning Supplies

Challenge

A leading global household good company needed to solve IT infrastructure issues related to non-actionable trouble tickets across the organization. Over 58% of the tickets were non actionable including 40% related to devices and service up/down. Approximately 18% were capacity related.

Solution

GAVS implemented GAVel for AIOps, GCare for monitoring and zMan task automation for elimination of capacity related alerts and elimination of device/service up/down issues along with predictive capabilities. The predictive capability of GAVel eliminated 18% capacity related alerts.

Benefits

The monitoring capability of GCare and the automation capability of zMan eliminated another 38.8% of alerts related to device/service up/down related. Additionally, GAVel’s AI driven correlation capabilities reduced 1% of alerts with a prediction accuracy of 80%.
